Class PlayerFactory

    • Method Detail

      • makeHumanPlayer

        public static HumanPlayer makeHumanPlayer​(java.lang.String name,
                                          Strategy hinter,
                                          int hints)
        Create a new HumanPlayer with specified name, hint AI and number of hints available.
        Parameters:
        name - the player name
        hinter - the hint AI strategy
        hints - the number of hints
        Returns:
        new HumanPlayer

      • makeDummyHumanPlayer

        public static HumanPlayer makeDummyHumanPlayer()
        Create a new dummy HumanPlayer with default name, by default having 3 hints available and using NaiveAI as hint AI. This is meant to be used by the Client to later set the username, and be able to configure AI's after connecting to the server.
        Returns:
        new HumanPlayer

      • makeHumanPlayer

        public static HumanPlayer makeHumanPlayer​(java.lang.String name)
        Create a new HumanPlayer with specified name, by default having 3 hints available and using NaiveAI as hint AI.
        Parameters:
        name - the player name
        Returns:
        new HumanPlayer

      • makeHumanPlayerFromInput

        public static HumanPlayer makeHumanPlayerFromInput​(java.util.Scanner scanner,
                                                   java.lang.String defaultName)
        Enter the player's name and create a new HumanPlayer, by default having 3 hints available and using NaiveAI as hint AI.
        Parameters:
        scanner - the scanner
        defaultName - the name to use as default
        Returns:
        new HumanPlayer

      • makeHumanPlayerFromInput

        public static HumanPlayer makeHumanPlayerFromInput​(java.util.Scanner scanner,
                                                   int hintCount)
        Enter the player's name and amount of hints, and create a new HumanPlayer. The hint AI is a Naive AI by default.
        Parameters:
        scanner - the scanner
        hintCount - the amount of hints
        Returns:
        new HumanPlayer

      • makeHumanPlayerFromInput

        public static HumanPlayer makeHumanPlayerFromInput​(java.util.Scanner scanner,
                                                   Strategy hinter,
                                                   int hintCount)
        Enter the player's name, specify the type of hint AI and number of hints, and create a new HumanPlayer.
        Parameters:
        scanner - the scanner
        hinter - the type of hint AI strategy
        hintCount - the amount of hints
        Returns:
        new HumanPlayer
